title: Online Practical Training Course for Strengthening Therapist Coaching Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental rehabilitation therapy knowledge and novice practical experience
context.additional_context: Non-degree education for adult professionals conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Five coaching events (self-directed goal setting, learner-centered intervention, meaningful reflection, practice, feedback) can be applied to actual therapy cases
Coaching behavior patterns can be identified and improvement plans proposed through analysis of parent-therapist interaction scenarios
Therapist behavior guides can be written with over 80% accuracy using case-specific coaching tools (ACT) provided on the online platform

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
